$edit_item_dialog_button: #invoice-structure > div.invoice-table > table > tbody:nth-child(2) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(1) > div > div > a.edit-invoice-item.fa.fa-pencil-square-o
$add_invoice_item_itemname: #addedit-invoice-item-dialog > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(1) > td > input
$add_invoice_item_itemdescriotion: #addedit-invoice-item-dialog > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td > textarea
$add_invoice_item_price: #addedit-invoice-item-dialog > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td > input
$add_invoice_item_qty: #addedit-invoice-item-dialog > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td > input
